posts.post_content:
I just upgraded, so this card is available. I'm asking $975 OBO.

Email: [url]danp306@gmail.com[/url].

Dan, have you sold the anson yet?  I hope you still love the Anson I sold ya.  Would you be willing to trade the Anson?  Check out my photo album on here and hopefully we can work a deal.

Pete

Yes, the card has been sold.  I'm very happy with the upgrade!  

Thanks,
Dan
